dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Manage and monitor all your relay accounts
dashboard.welcomeDescription: Your automated check-in manager is ready. Get started by adding your first account.

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.description: Manage your check-in accounts and credentials
accounts.noAccountsDescription: Get started by adding your first account or importing from JSON

batchUpdate.title: Batch Update Cookies
batchUpdate.description: Batch update cookies for multiple accounts via JSON. Accounts are matched by name and provider.
batchUpdate.exampleDescription: Accounts are matched by name and provider, then cookies and api_user are updated
batchUpdate.createIfNotExistsDescription: If an account in JSON doesn't exist in database, create it automatically
batchUpdate.error: Batch update failed. Please check JSON format.
batchUpdate.mustBeArray: JSON must be an array of accounts

accountCard.noModels: No models, click refresh to fetch

accountDialog.cookiesDescription: Paste cookies from browser devtools (JSON format)
accountDialog.createError: Failed to create account. Please try again.
accountDialog.updateError: Failed to update account. Please try again.

jsonImport.title: Import Accounts from JSON
jsonImport.description: Import one or multiple accounts by pasting JSON data. Supports both single account and batch import.
jsonImport.importError: Failed to import account. Please check the JSON format.
jsonImport.importBatchError: Failed to import accounts. Please check the JSON format.
jsonImport.invalidFormat: Invalid JSON: must be an object or array of objects

accountForm.cookiesInvalidJson: Invalid JSON format. Must be a valid JSON object.
accountForm.cookiesDescription: Enter cookies in JSON format. Example: {"session": "your_value"}
accountForm.cookiesHelp: Cookies: Open browser DevTools (F12), go to Application tab, find Cookies, copy the "session" cookie value
accountForm.apiUserHelp: API User: In DevTools Network tab, filter by Fetch/XHR, look for "New-Api-User" header (usually 5 digits)

checkIn.batchDescription: View detailed results of the batch check-in operation
checkIn.unsupportedProvider: This relay only supports refreshing balance
checkIn.buggedProvider: Check-in temporarily unavailable. Clicking will refresh the balance instead.

streaks.emptyDescription: Run a check-in to start building streak statistics.
streaks.allAccountsNotice: Showing all accounts. Select one to view detailed check-in data.
streaks.incrementZero: âš ï¸ No income increase today, so the check-in was not counted.

settings.title: Settings
settings.appearanceDescription: Customize the look and language of the app
settings.dataPerformanceDescription: Manage data caching and refresh behavior
settings.notificationDescription: Configure notification methods for check-in success/failure
settings.noNotificationChannels: No notification channels configured. Please set up notification methods in the system.
settings.cacheAgeDescription: How long to cache balance data before refreshing automatically.
settings.logLevelDescription: Adjust application log verbosity (requires app restart to take effect)
settings.logLevelSaved: Log level setting saved to config file, will take effect after app restart
settings.sidebarCollapsedDesc: Show icon only to save space
settings.appearanceLanguageDescription: Select your preferred language for the interface.
settings.localDatabaseDescription: Local storage usage for accounts and logs
settings.logFolderDescription: Collect detailed diagnostics by sharing this folder when reporting issues.

token.title: Tokens
token.description: Manage API tokens for your relay accounts
token.selectAccountPlaceholder: Choose an account to view tokens...
token.noAccountsDescription: Please add a provider account first
token.noTokensDescription: Click refresh to fetch tokens from the API
token.forTools: for use with AI coding tools
token.globalConfigDesc: This will write the configuration to ~/.claude/settings.json and apply globally to all Claude Code sessions.
token.claudeGlobalDesc: This will write the configuration to ~/.claude/settings.json and apply globally.
token.codexGlobalDesc: This will write the configuration to ~/.codex/config.toml and ~/.codex/auth.json and apply globally.
token.tempConfigDesc: Generate export commands to use in your current terminal session only.
token.tokenRestrictedNoCompatibleModels: This token is restricted to specific models and does not support the selected tool.
token.providerNoCompatibleModels: This provider does not support models compatible with the selected tool.
token.nodeHint: Manage nodes in the "Node Management" dialog
token.manageNodesHint: Go to Settings > Nodes to manage your API endpoints.
token.nodeManagementDesc: Manage custom nodes for each provider.
token.clearConfigDesc: This will only remove configurations managed by NeuraDock, preserving your other settings.
token.clearClaudeDesc: Clears ANTHROPIC_API_KEY, ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL and other managed settings from ~/.claude/settings.json
token.noModelLimits: Note: This token has no model restrictions.
token.providerModelsNote: Checking compatibility using provider's available models.
token.noCompatibleModelsForClaude: This provider does not support Claude-compatible models (Claude, GLM, DeepSeek, Gemini).
token.noGPTModels: Note: This token has no model restrictions. This provider may not have GPT models, but Codex can work with OpenAI-compatible APIs.
token.modelHint: Select a specific model to configure default model settings
token.geminiSupportComingSoon: Gemini configuration support is coming soon.

configDialog.toolDescription: Select the tool you want to configure
configDialog.subtitle: Configure connection settings and credentials.
configDialog.globalConfigDesc: Install the configuration globally for your CLI clients.
configDialog.tempSessionDesc: Generate export commands for the current terminal session only.

management.viewFullRecords: Click to view full check-in calendar
management.editInDialog: Please use the edit button to modify account settings

notification.noChannelsDesc: Add Feishu, DingTalk or email notification channels to get timely check-in results

dialog.description: Configure notification channel, notifications will be sent automatically on check-in success/failure
dialog.webhookKeyPlaceholder: Extract key from Feishu bot URL
dialog.webhookKeyHelpSuffix: Please fill in the xxx part
dialog.dingtalkWebhookPlaceholder: Extract key from DingTalk bot URL
dialog.dingtalkComingSoon: DingTalk notification support is coming soon
dialog.toPlaceholder: Separate multiple email addresses with commas
dialog.emailComingSoon: Email notification support is coming soon

liability.title: Liability Disclaimer
liability.description: This application only provides automated check-in tool services and has made every effort to simulate real browser behavior to minimize risks.
liability.warning: We do not guarantee that service providers will not ban accounts. Use of this tool is entirely voluntary, and users assume all responsibility for any consequences including account bans resulting from use of this tool.

license.title: Open Source & Commercial License
license.description: This project is released under the GNU General Public License v3.0. All redistributed or modified versions must remain GPL-compliant.
license.commercial: Closed-source distribution, SaaS, or commercial deployments require purchasing an official NeuraDock commercial license.
license.footer: Contact the NeuraDock team via official channels to buy a commercial license or confirm permitted use cases.

providerDialog.createDescription: Configure new provider information. Basic information is required, API configuration is optional (uses new-api standard defaults).

advancedNote.title: Default Values Note
advancedNote.description: The following configuration items are optional and use new-api standard default values. If your relay follows the new-api standard, you can leave them blank.

domain.label: Domain Address
domain.tooltip: Must start with http:// or https://
domain.invalidFormat: Domain must start with http:// or https://

needsWafBypass.label: Needs WAF Bypass
needsWafBypass.description: Enable Cloudflare and other WAF protection bypass (requires local browser)

supportsCheckIn.label: Supports Check-in
supportsCheckIn.description: Whether this provider supports automatic check-in

checkInBugged.label: Check-in Bugged
checkInBugged.description: Mark check-in as temporarily unavailable (will only refresh balance)

loginPath.label: Login Page Path
loginPath.tooltip: Path to the user login page

signInPath.label: Check-in API Path
signInPath.tooltip: API path for executing check-in operations

userInfoPath.label: User Info API
userInfoPath.tooltip: API path for getting user info and balance

tokenApiPath.label: Token API Path
tokenApiPath.tooltip: Path for getting API token list

modelsPath.label: Models List API
modelsPath.tooltip: API path for getting available models list

apiUserKey.label: API User Header
apiUserKey.tooltip: Request header field name for identifying users

providerCard.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete provider "{{name}}"?
providerCard.deleteWarning: Warning: This provider has {{count}} account(s). Deleting it will make these accounts unusable.
